channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree falling, 31st July
item.description:
Tree is falling. Outside number 8 Darenth road N16 6ej. It's extremely dangerous

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Darenth Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Lime bikes, 31st July
item.description:
Lime bikes are noisy and being delivered at 1am disturbing sleep and causing stress. There is continuous noise from early morning to very late at night by users. The lime cycle bay is for approx 5 bikes but 15-20 are offloaded each day (including at 1am)
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Middleton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 31st July

item.title: Overly bright lights - Victoria Way, 31st July
item.description:
Bright lights have recently been installed in the parking area of the flats (6 Victoria Way). These lights are a nuisance at night, shining directly into the house and causing difficulties in falling asleep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Way, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish repeatedly dumped outside my home on 64 castlewood road, 31st July
item.description:
There has been repeated fly-tipping outside my property for the past few weeks. It includes large amounts of cardboard, wooden panels, and other materials. I am not responsible for this rubbish, and I’m concerned about the risk of being wrongly fined.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Castlewood Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter strewn across street, 31st July
item.description:
A bag of dumped domestic rubbish was left here a couple of days ago and has now had the foxes on it. The contents are now spilled all across the pavement and road by that corner.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blandford Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Funfair at Hoblingwell Park being advertised 07/08 - 10/08, 30th July
item.description:
Signs are being erected for a funfair at Hoblingwell Park again (7th-10th August, so assuming they'll set up a couple of days before then). Nearest sign is outside the library on Mickleham Road. What is going to be done this time, after they damaged the wooden posts to get in last year, and Bromley had to erect a metal barrier after out of council tax money?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Petersham Drive, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal ramp on road, 30th July
item.description:
I believe that this house has put this ramp here illegally as they have another ramp beside their door. As a result of this, I have damaged my wheel because of this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dowlas Street, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet
